body_html:
This looks like a subtle bug introduced in a refactoring. Instead of array_ops.reverse_sequence, the bidirectional code should call _reverse_seq in that module. I'll fix it.
…

body:
This looks like a subtle bug introduced in a refactoring.  Instead of
array_ops.reverse_sequence, the bidirectional code should call _reverse_seq
in that module.  I'll fix it.

On Fri, Mar 3, 2017 at 10:57 AM, Dmitry Persiyanov <notifications@github.com
> wrote:
